Trade/Device Name(s): ADVIA Centaur Vitamin D Total (VitD) Assay
ADVIA Centaur Vitamin D Total (VitD) Calibrators
ADVIA Centaur Vitamin D Total (VitD) Quality Control (QC)
ADVIA Centaur Vitamin D Total Master (VitD) Curve Material
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens ADVIA Centaur Vitamin D Total Assay and associated calibrators and controls for quantitative measurement of 25-hydroxyvitamin D in serum and plasma using a chemiluminescent immunoassay on the ADVIA Centaur XP system.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of total 25 (OH) vitamin D in human serum and plasma using the ADVIA Centaur XP system as an aid in the determination of vitamin D sufficiency.
